title: Catching Up With John Skipper | The Bill Simmons Podcast
description:
HBO and The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by his good friend and former boss John Skipper, current executive chairman of DAZN, to discuss their time together at ESPN in the 2000s. They discuss ESPN the Magazine, acquiring television rights, Mobile ESPN, '30 for 30,' Grantland, Bill's departure from ESPN, and more.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
